concept.title: Hydraulic System Shutdown Procedure-Drill Rig T45

section.title: Purpose:
section.p: Purpose: This document provides standardized procedure for safely shutting down the hydraulic system on Epiroc Drill Rig T45 to aviod damge and enusre operater safety.

section.title: Scope:
section.p: Applicable to all field operators and maintenace technicians working on Epiroc Drill Rig T45 at any Epiroc approved site.
